column3: “Awesome citrus flavor… Great head buzz good for bullshittin and watchin a great flick.. Good Stuff!”

“This strain has the most mandarin orange taste and smoke I’ve ever experienced. My wife even noticed the orange citrus smell from the exhale. Very sedative effects but I generally just smoke for the flavours. I haven’t experienced tangie yet but so far this is my #1 for orange terps.”
“Has a great unique taste... Real smooth .... Great for relaxing and creativity”
“Very dense orange and light green color. Intense citrus flavor. Proper terpenes.”
